scripts.build: rm -rf dist && wp-scripts build && mkdir dist && cp -r build dist && cp bucket-browser-block.php dist/ &&  cp ./src/admin/admin.php dist/ && cp block.json dist/
scripts.cloudbuild: wp-scripts build && mkdir dist && cp -r build dist && head bucket-browser-block.php &&  cp ./src/admin/admin.php dist/ && cp bucket-browser-block.php dist/
scripts.start: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp bucket-browser-block.php dist/ && cp block.json dist/ &&  cp ./src/admin/admin.php dist/ && wp-scripts start --output-path=dist/build
